ygData.subject: Re: Imbalance between Bards that can only wear medium s izes and bards that can wear small and medium sizes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OK, from what you just said that seems to indicate you are a wood elf also. ... Why don t you just buy the small bronze plate armor instead of the medium.
ygData.messageBody:
> I am a lvl 22 bard on Bertox and I have begun to notice a severe imbalance
> between myself and my wood-elf brethren.
>
OK, from what you just said that seems to indicate you are a wood
elf also.

> Medium sized bronze armor is almost impossible to come by (i myself have
> NEVER seen any for sale) and
> small bronze plate armor is relatively easy to get. Other bards who are
> able to wear the small bronze plate are much more viable at my level than
> I,
> simply because they have the ability to absorb more damage than I do with
> my
> banded mail.
>
Why don't you just buy the small bronze plate armor instead of the
medium. It weighs less than medium size and that is very important for
wood-elves since their starting strength is lower than human and half-elven
bards.

My suggestion is moot if you are a human or half-elf bard but your
first statement led me to believe you were a wood-elf.

Galtin
E'ci
